author: donaldp
msg: Updated build file so that copying of xerces/avalonapi jars is controlled by a property. Thus gump can overide it.

author: donaldp
msg: Removed requirement of setting Class-Path in manifest with recent "lib is ext.dirs" change

author: donaldp
msg: Removed one more dependency and made code simpler to unserstand.

author: donaldp
msg: Updated both of the scripts to set java.ext.dirs to <base>/lib.
This should fix the problem with ext dirs interferring with actuall running of JVM and also allow a pool of system wide code to be used.
